name: file-matcher
description: Return list of files, matching by file attributes or/and contents

scripts.build:
npm run clean &&  npm run tslint && tsc && npm run cp-package && echo '
===> End of Build process'
scripts.test:
npm run build && echo '
===> Testing... ' && jasmine ./build/file-matcher/test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && istanbul cover jasmine ./build/file-matcher/test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.travis: npm run build && istanbul cover node jasmine ./build/file-matcher/test --captureExceptions && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
